resources.string: Chewing gum takes seven years for a person to digest
The Great Wall of China can be seen with the unaided eye from space
If a piece of paper was folded 45 times, it would reach to the moon
There are more stars in space than grains of sand on every beach in the world
Pirates wore eye patches so they could see better in the dark
For every human on Earth there are 1.6 million ants
It rains diamonds on Saturn and Jupiter
